attributes.action: Launch a New Bounce Back Loan/Grant Scheme for the travel/hospitality industry
attributes.additional_details: The Chancellor and the PM are an integral part of parliamentary democracy and therefore the Parliament needs to pass a resolution to discuss further help for the travel/hospitality industry in this difficult time by way of a Top-up Bounce Back Loan instead of a Recovery Loan Scheme which has failed to deliver.
attributes.background: The Chancellor did well in 2020 with the Bounce Back Loan. However, the money received wasn't enough due to the ongoing virus & restrictions. The Banks have failed to lend under RLS & therefore we need another top-up Bounce back loan BBL scheme for businesses to survive.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about support for the hospitality and travel industries, however it's not clear whether you want the Government to reinstate 'Bounce Back Loans', to create a grant scheme, or both.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

'Provide financial support for the Hospitality industry for Winter 2021': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603456

'Offer further financial support for Travel Agents and Travel Industry as a whole': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602334
